string.value: I spoke with #p2020010#, who had a new suggestion to help me piece together this puzzle. She told me to go to see #b#p1061011##k in Sleepywood. I can sense the answers coming soon--they'd better, because my feet are tiring from all this walking! \n\n#t4161028# #b#c4161028# / 1
My journey continues...#p1061011# had no idea about the book. But he said he might be able to point me in the right direction to who would know about the book...
#p2022003# said that those alive don't know about this skill. Then you may want to find those who aren't alive. Go to #b#m105040300##k. Perhaps you will find your answers there.
According to #p2022003#, some of the trainees from #m105040300# may know about this ultimate skill. #b#p1061011##k has been training for a long time. You can ask for help.
If you don't go, the clue of Bowman's ultimate skill will disappear and be lost to you...
Do you need to see me? The book...? Bowman's ultimate skill? I gather that's why you're here.
Sadly, I have no idea about that. But I can find somebody who knows more.
Don't you know #b#p1061011##k of #b#m105040300## ? He's busy with training, but will still speak with you. Don't hesitate to look for him. He's always appreciative of those handy with a Bow.
If you have nothing to say, don't disturb me!
Luckily, netherworld spirits found your book lost. Please be more mindful of where you leave this.
